languages.text: Ирлиэт Ланэвисс навсегда осталась пленницей Комморры — и душой, и телом. Ее перевоспитанием занимались лучшие ведьмы, телом — мастера плоти, и вскоре дитя Азуриана осквернила собственный камень душ, доказав темным кузенам, что отныне она — одна из них.
languages.translation_comment: Сломан Квест — Ирлиэт осталась в Комморре

languages.text: Yrliet Lanaevyss remained a prisoner of Commorragh, in soul and body, until the end of her days. Her re-education was put in the hands of the best Wyches, and her body was given over to the finest masters of flesh. Soon enough, the Child of Asuryan corrupted her own spirit stone, proving to her dark kin that she was one of them.
languages.original_text: Ирлиэт Ланэвисс навсегда осталась пленницей Комморры — и душой, и телом. Ее перевоспитанием занимались лучшие ведьмы, телом — мастера плоти, и вскоре дитя Азуриана осквернила собственный камень душ, доказав темным кузенам, что отныне она — одна из них.

traits.locale_text: Yrliet Lanaevyss until the end of her days remained a prisoner of Commorragh, in her soul and body. Her reeducation was put in the hands of the best Wyches, and her body — the best artisans of the flesh. Soon she, the Child of Asuryan, corrupted her own spirit stone and proved to her dark cousins that from now on she is one of them.

Soon she, the Child of Asuryan, corrupted her own spirit stone and proved to her dark cousins that from now on she is one of them.

Soon enough, the Child of Asuryan corrupted her own spirit stone and proved to her dark cousins that she was one of them.

Soon enough, the Child of Asuryan corrupted her own spirit stone and proved to her dark cousins that she was one of them.

Yrliet Lanaevyss remained a prisoner of Commorragh, in soul and body, until the end of her days. Her re-education was put in the hands of the best Wyches, and her body was given over to the finest masters of flesh. Soon enough, the Child of Asuryan corrupted her own spirit stone, proving to her dark kin that she was one of them.

Yrliet Lanaevyss remained a prisoner of Commorragh, in soul and body, until the end of her days. Her re-education was put in the hands of the best Wyches, and her body was given over to the finest masters of flesh. Soon enough, the Child of Asuryan corrupted her own spirit stone, proving to her dark kin that she was one of them.

languages.text: 伊莉耶特·拉娜维丝的灵魂和身体被囚禁在了科摩罗，直到生命的尽头。最优秀的巫灵重新调教了她的灵魂，而她的肉体则交给了最优秀的血肉大师。没过多久，这名阿苏焉之子便亲手腐化了自己的灵魂石，向她的黑暗表亲证明她已成为他们中的一员。
languages.original_text: Yrliet Lanaevyss remained a prisoner of Commorragh, in soul and body, until the end of her days. Her re-education was put in the hands of the best Wyches, and her body was given over to the finest masters of flesh. Soon enough, the Child of Asuryan corrupted her own spirit stone, proving to her dark kin that she was one of them.

traits.locale_text: 伊莉耶特·拉娜维丝的灵魂和身体被囚禁在了科摩罗，直到生命的尽头。最优秀的巫灵重新调教了她的灵魂，而她的肉体则交给了最优秀的血肉雕刻者。没过多久，这名阿苏焉之子便亲手腐化了自己的灵魂石，向她的黑暗表亲证明她已成为他们中的一员。

languages.text: Yrliet Lanaevyss blieb bis zum Ende ihrer Tage eine Gefangene Commorraghs, seelisch wie körperlich. Ihre Umerziehung wurde in die Hände der besten Hekatari gelegt, ihr Körper in die der besten Fleischkünstler. Schon bald korrumpierte das Kind von Asuryan ihren eigenen Seelenstein und bewies ihren dunklen Vettern, dass sie eine von ihnen war.
languages.original_text: Yrliet Lanaevyss remained a prisoner of Commorragh, in soul and body, until the end of her days. Her re-education was put in the hands of the best Wyches, and her body was given over to the finest masters of flesh. Soon enough, the Child of Asuryan corrupted her own spirit stone, proving to her dark kin that she was one of them.

traits.locale_text: Yrliet Lanaevyss blieb bis zum Ende ihrer Tage eine Gefangene Commorraghs, seelisch wie körperlich. Ihre Umerziehung wurde in die Hände der besten Hekatari gelegt, ihr Körper in die der besten Fleischkünstler. Schon bald korrumpierte das Kind von Asuryan ihren eigenen Seelenstein und bewies ihren dunklen Vettern, dass sie eine von ihnen war.

languages.text: Yrliet Lanaevyss resta prisonnière de Commorragh, physiquement et spirituellement, jusqu'à la fin de ses jours. Sa rééducation fut confiée aux meilleurs Cérastes et son corps, aux plus talentueux artisans de la chair. L'enfant d'Asuryan ne tarda pas à corrompre sa propre pierre-esprit pour prouver à ses ténébreux cousins qu'elle était l'une des leurs.
languages.original_text: Yrliet Lanaevyss remained a prisoner of Commorragh, in soul and body, until the end of her days. Her re-education was put in the hands of the best Wyches, and her body was given over to the finest masters of flesh. Soon enough, the Child of Asuryan corrupted her own spirit stone, proving to her dark kin that she was one of them.

traits.locale_text: Yrliet Lanaevyss resta prisonnière de Commorragh, physiquement et spirituellement, jusqu'à la fin de ses jours. Sa rééducation fut confiée aux meilleurs Cérastes et son corps, aux plus talentueux artisans de la chair. L'enfant d'Asuryan ne tarda pas à corrompre sa propre pierre-esprit pour prouver à ses ténébreux cousins qu'elle était l'une des leurs.

languages.text: Yrliet Lanaevyss siguió presa en Commorragh, en cuerpo y alma, hasta el fin de sus días. Su reeducación estuvo al cargo de las mejores brujas, y su cuerpo, al de los mejores artesanos de la carne. Pronto, la hija de Asuryan corrompió su propia joya espiritual y demostró a sus primos oscuros que era una de ellos.
languages.original_text: Yrliet Lanaevyss remained a prisoner of Commorragh, in soul and body, until the end of her days. Her re-education was put in the hands of the best Wyches, and her body was given over to the finest masters of flesh. Soon enough, the Child of Asuryan corrupted her own spirit stone, proving to her dark kin that she was one of them.

traits.locale_text: Yrliet Lanaevyss siguió presa en Commorragh, en cuerpo y alma, hasta el fin de sus días. Su reeducación estuvo al cargo de las mejores brujas, y su cuerpo, al de los mejores artesanos de la carne. Pronto, la hija de Asuryan corrompió su propia joya espiritual y demostró a sus primos oscuros que era una de ellos.

languages.text: ユリエット・ラナエフィスは、魂も肉体も最後までコモラフの囚人であり続けた。彼女の再教育は最高のウィッチの手に委ねられ、彼女の肉体は最高の屍肉の主たちの手に委ねられた。やがて、アシュリアンの御子は自らの魂縛石を汚染することで、闇の血族たちに対して自分も彼らの一員であることを証明した。
languages.original_text: Yrliet Lanaevyss remained a prisoner of Commorragh, in soul and body, until the end of her days. Her re-education was put in the hands of the best Wyches, and her body was given over to the finest masters of flesh. Soon enough, the Child of Asuryan corrupted her own spirit stone, proving to her dark kin that she was one of them.

traits.locale_text: ユリエット・ラナエフィスは、魂も肉体も最後までコモラフの囚人であり続けた。彼女の再教育は最高のウィッチの手に委ねられ、彼女の肉体は最高の屍肉の主たちの手に委ねられた。やがて、アシュリアンの御子は自らの魂縛石を汚染することで、闇の血族たちに対して自分も彼らの一員であることを証明した。

languages.text: Yrliet Lanaevyss ölene dek ruhen ve bedenen Commorragh'ta mahkûm olarak kaldı. Yeniden eğitimi en iyi Viçlerin eline, bedeni ise en başarılı et üstatlarına teslim edildi. Asuryan'ın Çocuğu, çok geçmeden kendi ruh taşını yozlaştırarak karanlık soydaşlarına onlardan biri olduğunu ispatladı.
languages.original_text: Yrliet Lanaevyss remained a prisoner of Commorragh, in soul and body, until the end of her days. Her re-education was put in the hands of the best Wyches, and her body was given over to the finest masters of flesh. Soon enough, the Child of Asuryan corrupted her own spirit stone, proving to her dark kin that she was one of them.

traits.locale_text: Yrliet Lanaevyss ölene dek, ruhen ve bedenen Commorragh'ta bir mahkûm olarak kaldı. Yeniden eğitimi en iyi Viçlerin eline, bedeni ise en başarılı et üstatlarına teslim edildi. Asuryan'ın Çocuğu çok geçmeden kendi ruh taşını yozlaştırarak, karanlık soydaşlarına onlardan biri olduğunu ispatladı.

languages.translation_comment: Сломан Квест — Ирлиэт осталась в Комморре
